    • copyProperty

      protected void copyProperty(org.springframework.core.env.ConfigurableEnvironment environment, String sourcePropertyName, String targetPropertyName, String defaultValue)
      targetPropertyName 값을 sourcePropertyName 값으로 대체한다. 값이 없을 경우, defaultValue를 사용함.
      Parameters:
      environment - ConfigurableEnvironment
      sourcePropertyName - source property name
      targetPropertyName - target property name
      defaultValue - default value when source property value is empty or not contained
